title: A Cop Escapes Prison To Get Revenge | American Criminal | Full Action Movie

sources.title: A Cop Escapes Prison To Get Revenge | American Criminal | Full Action Movie
sources.description:
A Cop Escapes Prison To Get Revenge | American Criminal | Full Action Movie

When an officer convicted of murder escapes from prison, he seeks revenge on those responsible for his conviction. Setting up a kangaroo court, the officer kidnaps the judge, prosecutor, and jury, putting them on trial for their lives...

2019.  Stars: Yancy Butler, Justin Deas, Colleen Zenk
